description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows SmartScreen security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-38180), it is essential to apply the relevant KB updates for your specific Windows version:

1. Locate the appropriate KB update for your system version from the list below.
2. Download and install the update from the provided Microsoft Update Catalog links.
3. Restart your system to ensure that the updates are applied successfully.

**Details**:
- **Windows 11**:
  - Version 24H2: [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)
  - Version 23H2: [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
  - Version 22H2: [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
  - Version 21H2: [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)
- **Windows 10**:
  - Version 22H2: [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
  - Version 21H2: [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is on a compatible build version as listed.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
